Activate quiz

Source: R/activate_quiz.R
activate_quiz.Rd

Activates pre-existing quiz (perhaps made with create_quiz()) by setting unlock time, due time and publishes it.

Usage

activate_quiz(
  course_id,
  quiz_id,
  unlock_at,
  time_open = minutes(10),
  access_code = NULL
)

Arguments

course_id

id number of the course. Go to your course home page and the number is at the end of the url.

quiz_id

The id number of the quiz. This is the number at the end of the quiz url.

unlock_at

date-time to unlock quiz - defaults to current time (Canvas accepts times in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2011-10-21T18:48Z). You can use iso8601() to format the date-time correctly.

time_open

time to keep quiz open (in minutes) - default to ten minutes. Set to NULL to keep quiz open

access_code

Optional access code for the quiz

Value

A quiz object (invisible)

On this page
